7.19

GENERAL

  • Daily Bonus Hero changed from 2 Mangoes to 1
  • Added 2 trees near the cliff area below the Dire primary jungle shrine

HEROES

ABADDON
MIST COIL
  • Mist Coil manacost reduced from 50/60/70/80 to 50
ANCIENT APPARITION
ICE VORTEX
  • Ice Vortex manacost reduced from 80/90/100/110 to 65/80/95/110
BLOODSEEKER
THIRST
  • Thirst bonus rescaled from 16/24/32/40 to 7/18/29/40
TALENTS
  • Level 25 Talent reduced from +20% Max Thirst and Damage to +18%
BROODMOTHER
SPIN WEB
  • Spin Web movement speed reduced from 40/50/60/70% to 25/40/55/70%
  • Spin Web charge replenish rate increased from 40 to 45 seconds

  • Base strength increased by 2
CRYSTAL MAIDEN

  • Base strength reduced by 1

  • Nature's Attendants manacost increased from 110/120/140/150 to 170/160/150/140

  • Reaper's Scythe Scepter cooldown increased from 55/40/25 to 60/50/40
  • Reaper's Scythe cast point increased from 0.5 to 0.55

  • Ghost Shroud self magic resistance reduction increased from 30% to 40%

FIREBLAST
  • Fireblast damage increased from 55/110/165/220 to 60/120/180/240

  • Sanity's Eclipse damage multiplier increased from 8/9/10 to 9/10/11

  • Base intelligence reduced by 2

  • Juxtapose Illusion incoming damage increased from 500% to 600%
PHOENIX
TALENTS
  • Level 15 Talent reduced from +60 Fire Spirits DPS to +50
PUCK
WANING RIFT
